author: dug
msg: Add support for a client defining a non-HTTP transport chain
and while I was at it changed it so that the doLocal set the
transport chain to AxisServer instead of replacing AxisClient

author: rubys
msg: Merge in changes from Glen Daniels to make this Runnable.

author: rubys
msg: Convert from static invocation to per instance.  This will enable
future use in unit tests and perhaps even a GUI.

author: gdaniels
msg: Test the right behavior for ElementToStream(), i.e. no XML declaration.

author: gdaniels
msg: Make the *ToStream() methods work symmetrically with *ToString().  In
other words, omit the XML declaration for ElementToStream().
